net.bytebuddy.implementation.bind.annotation

类 TargetMethodAnnotationDrivenBinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.bytebuddy.implementation.bind.annotation.TargetMethodAnnotationDrivenBinder
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    MethodDelegationBinder

    public class TargetMethodAnnotationDrivenBinder
extends Object
implements MethodDelegationBinder
    This MethodDelegationBinder binds method by analyzing annotations found on the target method that is subject to a method binding.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      protected static class  TargetMethodAnnotationDrivenBinder.DelegationProcessor
      A delegation processor is a helper class for a TargetMethodAnnotationDrivenBinder for performing its actual logic.
      static interface  TargetMethodAnnotationDrivenBinder.ParameterBinder<T extends Annotation>
      A parameter binder is used as a delegate for binding a parameter according to a particular annotation type found on this parameter.
      protected static class  TargetMethodAnnotationDrivenBinder.Record
      A compiled record of a target method annotation-driven binder.

      • 从接口继承的嵌套类/接口 net.bytebuddy.implementation.bind.MethodDelegationBinder

        MethodDelegationBinder.AmbiguityResolver, MethodDelegationBinder.BindingResolver, MethodDelegationBinder.MethodBinding, MethodDelegationBinder.MethodInvoker, MethodDelegationBinder.ParameterBinding<T>, MethodDelegationBinder.Processor, MethodDelegationBinder.TerminationHandler

      限定符 构造器和说明

        protected TargetMethodAnnotationDrivenBinder(TargetMethodAnnotationDrivenBinder.DelegationProcessor delegationProcessor)
        Creates a new target method annotation-driven binder.
        参数:
        delegationProcessor - The delegation proessor to use.

    • 方法详细资料

      • of

        public static MethodDelegationBinder of(List<? extends TargetMethodAnnotationDrivenBinder.ParameterBinder<?>> parameterBinders)
        Creates a new method delegation binder that binds method based on annotations found on the target method.
        参数:
        parameterBinders - A list of parameter binder delegates. Each such delegate is responsible for creating a MethodDelegationBinder.ParameterBinding for a specific annotation.
        返回:
        An appropriate method delegation binder.

      • compile

        public MethodDelegationBinder.Record compile(MethodDescription candidate)
        从接口复制的说明: MethodDelegationBinder
        Compiles this method delegation binder for a target method.
        指定者:
        compile 在接口中 MethodDelegationBinder
        参数:
        candidate - The target method to bind.
        返回:
        A compiled target for binding.
